reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Dialogue between Women MP?s from Serbia and Kosova

description.narrative: Regional Women?s Lobby for Peace Security and Justice (RWL) is a regional organization which brings together women politicians experts and activists from the western Balkans committed to the goals of deepening human security promoting women's rights and pa rticipation in decision-making processes and breaking barriers of ethno-centric politics. The RWL has a total of 24 members from the seven different countries of the region including Albania Bosnia and Herzegovina Croatia Kosovo Macedonia Montenegro and Se rbia. The main objective of the project is to contribute and to facilitate the dialogue in the region between women MPs from Serbia and Kosovo ? supported by the representatives of RWL Members from other countries in the region Montenegro Kosovo Serbia Cro atia Bosnia + Herzegovina Albania and Macedonia. Their aim is to:- Provide contribution to the ongoing technical dialogue between Belgrade and Pristina.- Establish the regional cooperation on Women?s empowerment and how to overcome existingobstacles.- Emph asize the importance of collaboration between women in politics and civil society.- To create forum of women MPs to support and introduce women?s perspective.During the implementation phase of the project ?Dialogue between Women MP?s from Serbia and Kosova ? RWL will organize two conferences.
